product_name: Innova Disc Golf DX Aviar Putt and Approach Disc
long_description: The Innova Disc Golf DX Aviar putt and approach disc offers versatility and dependability in a wide range of conditions. Perfect for beginners, the versatile, dependable design is geared toward putting and accurate approaches. Crafted with a blend of grippy, resilient polymers to offer the best combination of grip and durability. PDGA approved for use on all disc golf courses. Sorry, color and weight requests cannot be accommodated; please shop in-store for specific colors and weights.
short_description: The Innova Disc Golf DX Aviar putt and approach disc offers versatility and dependability in a wide range of conditions.
